con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="FactoriesQuotesOrders" targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/payment/v1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:excgen="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/exceptiongeneric" xmlns:tns="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/payment/v1"> <types> <schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/payment/v1"> <include schemaLocation="../../xsd/Transport.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/exceptiongeneric" schemaLocation="../../../../Common/exceptiongeneric.xsd"/> </schema> </types> <wsdl:message name="Payment_in"> <wsdl:part name="PaymentRq" element="tns:PaymentRq"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="Payment_out"> <wsdl:part name="PaymentRs" element="tns:PaymentRs"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="Payment_fault1"> <wsdl:part name="exceptionGeneric" element="excgen:exceptionGeneric"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="PaymentPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="payment"> <wsdl:input name="Payment_Input" message="tns:Payment_in"/> <wsdl:output name="Payment_Output" message="tns:Payment_out"/> <wsdl:fault name="Payment_Fault" message="tns:Payment_fault1"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="PaymentBinding" type="tns:PaymentPortType"> <soap12:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="payment"> <soap12:operation soapAction="payment"/> <wsdl:input name="Payment_Input"> <soap12:body parts="PaymentRq" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="Payment_Output"> <soap12:body parts="PaymentRs" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="Payment_Fault"> <soap12:fault name="Payment_Fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="PaymentService"> <wsdl:port name="PaymentPort" binding="tns:PaymentBinding"> <soap12:address location="http://localhost:8080/message/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/exceptiongeneric" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:this="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/exceptiongeneric"> <element name="exceptionGeneric" type="this:exceptionGeneric"/> <complexType name="exceptionGeneric"> <sequence> <element name="code" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="description" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="subCode" type="this:exceptionGeneric" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/payment/v1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:crecar="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/creditcard" xmlns:this="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/payment/v1"> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/creditcard" schemaLocation="../../../BusinessEntities/CreditCard.xsd"/> <element name="PaymentRq"> <complexType> <complexContent> <restriction base="crecar:CreditCard"> <sequence> <element name="cardType" type="crecar:cardTypeEnum" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="cardNumber" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> </element> <element name="PaymentRs"> <complexType> <complexContent> <restriction base="crecar:CreditCard"> <sequence> <element name="valid" type="boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> </element> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/creditcard" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:this="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/creditcard"> <complexType name="CreditCard"> <sequence> <element name="cardType" type="this:cardTypeEnum" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="cardNumber" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="valid" type="boolean" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="cardTypeEnum"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="DISCOVER"/> <enumeration value="VISA"/> <enumeration value="MASTERCARD"/> <enumeration value="AMERICANEXPRESS"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </schema>
